message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that truly exceeds expectations. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
